inn1.comm: slides it across, just short of good length, Tharanga leaves
much more bite now, zip and away shape from short of a length, left alone
right on middle stump now, again Morkel's typical short of driving length, defended
line gone wrong this time, straight and down leg
and again, shorter length, but further down the leg side too
uh oh, this straight line is not working at all for Morne, he's pitched another way outside leg stump and it's three wides in a row

oh dear, Morkel's produced the edge first ball from the changed angle, Tharanga's gone for a drive to a full delivery, it's held its line enough to take the edge but Alviro at second slip has put down a straightforward catch
back of a length, defended off an inside edge
Morkel's got to forget this over quick, he's angled it down the pads, and Tharanga's helped himself to four easy runs with a fine tickle
sharp back of a length ball allowed to go past outside off
they are sending them all over the place, now Morris has sprayed one down the leg side
wow, now come on, this can;t be happening at both ends, Morris has sent one down leg with all the angle, and it has bounced in front to give the keeper an early workout
Morris avoids Morkel's fate, the wide hat-trick, left alone on the angle across the left-hander
almost another wide, slanted across way outside off, just inside the marker
Morkel got a dropped catch the moment he changed the angle, Morris keeps the prevalent trend going with one more delivery down the leg side
hello, unbelievable, this went beyond funny some million wides ago, Morris straight, full and w-i-d-e outside off now
not a wide, not a wide, full outside off, flashed behind point
short ball into Dilshan, who pulls it behind square
this is not a wide, but it has provided too much width all the same to Dilshan, and he's smashed it through the covers
left alone outside off
couple of feet outside off, goodish length, not too much carry, left alone
much closer to off stump, about as close as he's got today, defended off the front foot
pitched up ball pushed to the bowler
widish, short of a length, left alone
around the blockhole, dug out down the track
pushes at one angled in outside off, thick edge runs past the second slip, third man has to dive, it's Morkel
pitched up to off, and Dilshan's forced it between cover and point
almost got the gap, but cover's dived to his right this time to deny Dilshan

Morris has produced a wicket amid after those wides, Dilshan's got one angled in towards his pads, he's tried forcing square, but has missed it, the ball's brushed the pad and his stumps have been rattled
super delivery, right on the stumps, close to the blockhole, Sanga jams the bat down
they seem to have weeded those wides out now, a bouncer just outside off comes to Tharanga, who ducks
pushed to the covers
lovely, this holds its line after pitching good length and draws Tharanga into a poke, beats him
whoa, cracker of a punch, good length on off, he's stayed in his crease, and drilled it between extra cover and mid off
reverts to back of a length, Tharanga rides it and plays it out to point
short of a good length, pushed away
back of a length ending on off, Sanga's moved across and is behind it to block
moves well across again to defend back to the bowler
Sanga's gone for an expansive cover drive, but he;s got a shade too close with that across movement, and has ended up hitting it towards mid off
goodish length, left alone outside off
back of a length into the pads, worked fine
that is too wide, that is Tharanga's zone, and he's cut it deliberately high in the air over covers
shot, Sanga's cut this so hard, it's spilled out of point's hands, possibly some bad bounce as well
steered down to square third man
moving across and ending on off stump, good length, defended
slanted widish across the left-hander
ends outside off stump with the back foot as he shuffles across and lets another one go
just outside off stump, Sanga is there with the shuffle, and pushes to cover, not getting the single though
angled across to off stump, pushed to covers
comes down the track but only pushes it away
angled across again, just outside off, cut to point
slight turn down the leg side, would have been wide had he not tucked it to square leg
shot, Tharanga had been itching to jump out, Peterson gives it some air, Tharanga reaches the pitch and drills it past mid off
comes out again, too close to the pitch this time, and mishits to extra cover
good length around off, pushed away
that didn;t look like he'd got much on it, but the ball's raced pats midwicket as Sanga works it from outside off
picture perfect, knee bent, on the ground, lovely followthrough, crisp drive, straight to extra cover
drives again, but with lesser power and to cover now
bouncer on leg stump, ducked under
short again, further down leg, not getting up much, Sanga has a boundary for the taking, but he does not time the pull, and it rolls fine
comes across and turns it off middle to midwicket
straightish length ball on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
long on had been brought in, Sanga skipped out early, and launched  clean hit that crashed into the boundary rope
tossed up on leg stump, worked away to deep midwicket
nudged to square leg
what is it with the South African pacers today, now McLaren starts with a length ball down the pads, and is whipped away to fine leg
length angled in, stays a shade low and hits him on the pad, headed down leg of course
bowled at middle from wide of the crease, good length again, blocked back
goes back of a length, Tharanga is surprised by the bounce, misses it, and is hit
follows up the shortish one with one pitched up for the drive, Tharanga is ready and his bat flows through the line, Peterson dives at cover
skiddy one staying low into the pads, pulled away square
flighted low full toss, Tharanga cannot place it wide of the sweeper
quick and flat outside off, Sanga does not have much time and hits it to cover
makes him drive with a fuller one, straight to cover
tossed up fullish, Sanga drives to the sweeper
now Tharanga drives past cover to the sweeper, another single
misses a short of a length ball, is hit high on the pad, but is alert enough to respond to the non-striker for a leg-bye
punched nicely but straight to extra cover
good length ball on middle and leg, worked off a thick inside edge behind square
Tharanga goes after a slower one pitched up, there is a thick edge, but there are no slips, and Ab's dive is futile
tries to cut and misses
flashes a good length ball out to square third man
good length, no room, played out in front of square leg
Tharanga picks four more in his favourite region, feet wide apart and placing a cut behind point
defended off the front foot
tossed up and straightening on the pad, nudged behind square
walks out, Duminy darts it in, Sanga cannot work it past square leg
on off stump, pushed back
some flight, Sanga comes down and eases it to long off
tosses it up full outside off, Sanga flashes a drive it to mid off
comes out to a flighted one, midwicket dives and prevents the single
turning down the pad, Sanga's got some bat on it, AB' was moving to his right but he really had no chance
flighted and comes on quicker to off stump, pushed back
drives to extra cover, who dives and parries it to mid off
pushes a tossed up ball to extra cover
comes out and drives crisply but picks out extra cover once more
punched off the back foot to long on
pushes a quicker length ball to extra cover
tosses it wider, Tharanga comes down but is too close to the pitch and pushes to extra cover
looked to come forward, saw it pitched flat and quick and widish, and remained in the crease to cut swiftly past point
this rises from back of a length, not that much, but Sanga decided to duck, barely went over him
length ball driven past extra cover to the sweeper
sharp, back of a length, into Tharanga, awkwardly worked square
the wides are back, this is short and a couple of feet down the leg side
worked away wristily but straight to midwicket
this shortish ball hurried into Sanga, but he swivelled quickly to pull through square leg, needed a sprint and a dive from Ingram in the deep to save what looked  a certain boundary
another short ball, Sanga misses it this time, tried a half-hearted pull in the end
comes out seeing some flight, but he is done in as it pitches much in front, has to play it out to leg
worked off the pad, straight to square leg
there is a shout for lbw as he misses a pull to one that didn;t get up at all, but that probably pitched outside leg, just outside, says the ball-tracker
pushed to cover for a quick run
comes forward to one fullish on middle, drives it to long on
drives but does not time it too well, extra cover runs to his left to cut it off
a drive to mid on and a quick singe, throw misses, Sanga was in anyway
Morkel is sure there is an edge to the keeper, AB does not join in, Tharanga tried to ramp a short ball over the keeper, missed
145 kph length ball does him for pace, he stabs it towards cover
short, into the body, Tharanga fends it onto the pitch and gets off strike
pushed down the track
some bounce on the pads, worked to square leg
tries to sweep a flighted ball on the pad, misses
flighted full on middle and leg, Tharanga cannot beat midwicket
Phangiso goes flying to his right but is only able to half-stop a push
now Faf dives big time at midwicket but Sanga's drive beats him on its way to wide long on
Tharanga seemed to have made up his mind early, walked down the pitch but wan't able to get much elevation as he tried to go over midwicket
Tharanga's edged one too many this time, Morkel's bowled a good length ball from round the stumps, Tharanga was looking to guide it, and has instead played on off an inside edge
gets on his toes and defends a back of a length ball
145.4 kph short ball close to off, Mahela was thinking about a pull initially, but decided to run it past gully
146.8 kph now from Morkel, he is pounding in, short into Sanga who pulls it down to long leg
goodish length, pushed to cover
short again, at Mahela's throat, he reacts late and quick, with a hook along the ground to deep square leg
goes back to a tossed up ball and pushes it to the bowler
this is tossed up outside off, he waits and cuts past point
walks out and pushes to long on
cuts a tossed up length ball again, finds point now
flighted on off, defended
pushes a pitched up ball in the air, but safely wide of the bowler down to long off
widish, steered to third man
Sanga walks out, Morris drops it short, it goes square off the pad
this came in with the angle on off stump, Mahela got the bat down just in time to work it behind square
that was too wide from round the stumps, slow too, Sanga cranked up and went after it, but he picked out the sweeper
short into the body from way wide of the crease, pulled down easily to fine leg
lovely, Sanga got a pitched up ball around off, but his shuffle allowed him to place the drive past mid on's dive
defends a tossed up ball on middle
angled full down leg now, Mahela gets outside the line and sweeps hard, but deep square leg saves the boundary with a dive to his right, he had lots of ground to cover
pushed to midwicket
he's been playing the cut to flighted balls, waits again and times it between point and short third
much quicker but again some width and Mahela is ready, feet wide apart and placing a sharper cut between the same two men
pushed to extra cover
walks out and pushes but finds point in the way
goes across and tucks a short of a length ball from middle to deep square
tighter stuff, angled in good length to off, blocked
overpitched slower one, driven to the sweeper
boucer, pulled in the air, to deep square
goes after a 143.5 kph wide delivery, misses the cut
good length ball on the pad, tucked easily to deep square
tossed up and angled in full to middle, defended
sees him come out and darts it in, Mahela pads it away
flighted full, eased to long on
pushed to long on, no risk at all
pushed through quick down the leg side
waits on a tossed up delivery, pushes it late to point
full and slow outside off, he mishits a slog to deep square leg
whoa, Mahela's succeeded with the slog, he's picked this length delivery from well outside off and smashed it in the air, but to mid on's left
more runs, they have overdone the short ball to Mahela, he's again fetched it from outside off and pulled over midwicket, no one in the deep there
widish length ball, he goes for the drive but is beaten, slight away shape, only slight
right forward and opens the face to steer it behind point
mishits the drive, mid off is deepish, but he is quick enough to make Sanga go back
goes back to a length ball on middle and leg, and works it square
comes forward and gets bat in front of pad to drive to midwicket
nudges it square and deep midwicket has lots of ground to make, and his throw is wayward as well, easy double
he's been cutting these flighted deliveries all day from Phangiso, does that again, waits, goes back late and picks up one to deep point
Sanga jumps out, Phangiso tries pushing it across, but Sanga stops, gets down on the knee and slogs the sweep over deep midwicket, that is some connection
angled in good length, does not turn, is nudged square
Sanga gets to one more ODI fifty with a push to long on, and the horns go on and on at the Premadasa

that looked pretty straight, but the leg-before appeal is turned down by umpire Martinesz after Mahela missed the sweep, AB makes the signal for a review finally after some discussions, it was coming in with the angle, no turn, hit him in front of middle and leg, and the ball-tracker says it is missing leg stump
and next ball Mahela moves inside the line and plays his chip shot over extra cover, in the gap in the deep for two more
pushed back to the bowler
full, worked off the pads, but short fine gets the dive in
makes room and cuts from middle stump, to the sweeper
a back-foot punch down to long on, easily done
tossed up but into the pad, Mahela is happy to play from the crease and tucks it square
hit on the pad as he misses the sweep, but that pitched outside leg
skips out and hits it hard, but straight to extra cover
wants the single after running a ball to point, but has to get back
angled in, middle and leg, worked to deep square
shortish, and that has almost rolled along, Sanga was alert though, opened up and punched it to long on
comes down the track and hits out to deep midwicket
he tried the lofted shot over extra cover, but hit it too straight, on the bounce to long off
full delivery pushed back
starts full on off, is worked softly to mid on
defends a good length ball
tried steering a very short ball, it's come very slowly off the pitch, and Mahela's missed
moves in after pitching good length outside off, Mahela shuffles across and nudges it fine
good length on off stump, Sanga pushes but finds mid off
short ball pulled away, but straight to deep square leg
drops it shortish as Sanga comes out, takes one with a push to long on
Mahela executes the lofted drive over extra cover to perfection, splitting the gap between long off and the sweeper
pushes through point for one more
leaving the crease all the time, clipping it between deep midwicket and deep square leg for an easy two
bowled full on the stumps, he makes slight room and drills it hard, but finds mid off
comes out and pushes but cannot get it past midwicket, is furious with himself
he bowls a short of length delivery on off, the batsman defends it back down the pitch
slightly fuller this time, but Mahela drives it straight back to the bowler, who bends down in time to stop that
ah! beats the bat this time! It was a length delivery just outside off, it comes in with the angle and then straightens to beat Mahela's defence

short ball this time and what have you done Mahela! He plays a nothing pull shot straight into the hands of the deep midwicket fielder. There was no power in that shot, wasn't a tough delivery either. It was just below chest high..Ah well
back of length delivery on off, the batsman defends it off the back foot
this one is a good short ball! Doesn't get up too much, but is aimed at the body. The batsman arches back to get out of the way
overpitched ball driven wide of sweeper cover
cuts in front of square, there is a misfield from Petersen running across
punched down to long on
leans forward to push to cover

Thirimanne has escaped, he's tried to play the slog sweep, hasn't found any timing, but the ball's landed safely in front of deep square leg, and out of the reach of the men running after it from inside the circle
pushed back to the bowler
starts with one in the blockhole just outside off, and Thirimanne can only dig it out
length ball whipped off the pad but can;t beat square leg
overpitched, on the pads again, clipped to deep square
he is staying leg side to the left-handers, Sanga can't bat on this one
one more down the pads, and again it hits them as Sanga misses with the flick, AB's lob is wayward, but bowler ensures no run conceded
this was coming, he;s been on the pads all along this over, this is a full toss now, and Sanga is not missing out three times in a row, short fine leg watches it go past
just outside off, back of a length, guided to third man
slowish and pitched up, he drives hard but straight to point
backs away and slashes, it flies in the air down to square third man
gets away with a short ball down the leg side as Thirimanne pulls it on the bounce to short fine leg
slower one on a tight length right on off stump, he misses with the dab
gets outside leg stump and scythes a pitched up delivery past point's dive, but the sweeper gets around
starts outside off now on a good length, is driven powerfully but extra cover's in the way
walks and stands outside off before the ball is delivered, gets it thereabouts and works it square on leg
backs away but misses the cut, it was slow and back of a length
makes room once more and heaves, mishits it weakly to mid on
he is backing away to leg consistently, bowler follows him this time with a short one, is pulled to deep square leg, who fumbles but recovers quickly
now Thirimanne shuffles outside leg, gets a full toss but pushes it to extra cover
saw him going to the leg side and dragged it across to off, but ended up overdoing it
this time he makes the connection he wanted, it is overpitched on the stumps, his front leg is out of the way and a clean swing has it disappearing past extra cover
just over deep square leg's jump. Sanga is withdrawing to leg all the time, is followed this time, but adjusts to whack a flat pull in the air
short ball, leg side, Sanga pulls to the fine leg boundary
another boundary, Morris pitches it up this time, staying leg side again, and Sanga plays a lovely lofted drive over midwicket
bowler gets one back with a yorker right on the stumps from the changed angle, Sanga jams the bat down
charges out now, but gets too close and mishits to the covers, the throw is wide at the bowler's but short fine runs in to prevent the overthrow
short, slow, dragged to deep square leg
he moves outside off stump, it arrives full, he is just able to get some bat down to send it to fine leg
wide and full, Sanga reaches for it but misses
Sanga's clattering them all around now, this is a slower ball, but is sitting up wide and shortish, Sanga waits and slaps it over the covers
outstanding timing, Sanga keeps hitting them, pitched up on leg, and he flows into a lofted shot over midwicket, it clears the boundary by some distance
short slower one gone wrong down leg
overpitched on leg, he makes some room, drills it to long on
starts with an angled ball that carries well down leg
that will do, Sanga blasts his way to his 16th ODI century with a dismissive pull past long on to a half tracker, 35 off his last 12, super acceleration
eased down to long on
Thirimanne meanwhile escapes with a thick inside edge past the stumps as he is caught in ht crease to one that comes in
overpitched outside off, driven to the sweeper
he drives off the front foot, finds extra cover
he floats it full and wide, Thirimanne attacks it, mishits it totally to the bowler
short of a length, guided to point
moves across and swats a pitched up ball, does not get hold of it, takes one to long on
backs away to leg, Morkel bowls a yorker outside off, Thirimanne misses
gets a short ball into the body and off the front foot, mishits a pull that loops in the air over square leg
overpitched on leg, a silken drive along the ground to long on
around the blockhole once again, on off stump, he waits and guides it behind point, whose dive saves the single
sweeps from outside off, beats square leg's dive and picks up four more
skips out, but gets too close as JP angles it in, pushes it back
a flat length ball outside off slapped to the sweeper
punched straight to extra cover, the struggle continues
walks out and pushes in the air to midwicket
quick and full, slapped hard but he;s picked out extra cover on the edge of the circle
he heaves at a length ball angled in to him, and misses, the ball bounces over the stumps
uh oh, this is more than a struggle now, he's hurting Sri Lanka now, tries to run a slower one to third man, can;t connect again
Morkel follows up with a ripping yorker, Thirimanne finally gets off strike, guiding it to third man
the contrast is stark, and disturbing for Sri Lanka, Sanga makes some room and goes as effortlessly as you can over extra cover
now he goes over midwicket, slightly short slower one, and he is waiting with the full swing of the bat
he walks outside off and tries to scoop it fine, Morkel sends it far down leg, but umpire Kettleborough does not wide it, too harsh, on the batsman, Sanga is not impressed
he jumps out, JP goes wide, Thirimanne reaches out and drives to the sweeper
as palpably as Thirimanne is struggling to pick them, Sanga is finding gaps with insane consistency, now he picks it from outside off and slog-sweeps to the deep midwicket boundary
no need to pick the gap this time, this is going over, swept from off stump, swept behind square, swept in the air, swept all the way, what  a champion
he had so much time he could have done anything, waits on a slow, flat, and short one, and swat it over extra cover's jump in the end
follows him as he backs to leg with a 103.7 kph dart, Sanga chips it to long on
he is still not timing it, what must be going through his mind seeing the legend go bonkers at the other end, comes down the track, manages a thick inside edge square to leg
he went outside leg, but McLaren followed him with a full one, Thirimanne can;t get bat to ball, but gets off strike as the ball rolls to leg
after about a millenium, he mistimes one to long on even as he makes room outside leg
slower short ball, Thirimanne dabs it in the air, but there's not much behind the stroke, and third man gets around
top delivery, Sanga gets a yorker angled in to leg stump, gets some bat on it, they go for the single, AB dives and lows, misses, Thirimanne would have been gone had he hit
yet another yorker, fine over this, Thirimanne opens the face as he brings bat down on it
gone this time, uh oh, wait, umpire Kettleborough is calling a no-ball, even as McLaren has hit the stumps on the full after Sanga walked outside off and missed the scoop
Sanga connects this time, walking outside off again, the ball is full at his pads, but he gets the bat down in time, and fine leg messes up at the boundary
Thirimanne gets off strike early with a single to point off a full delivery
a thick edge now, he's earned luck with all that hitting, bends the knee and flashes at a full ball, it flies past short third man
and again, same region, four more, comes down the wicket, McLaren goes full, Sanga seemed to open the face as he went after it
drills a full delivery straight to point,
sets himself up for the scoop, but Morris pings it down leg, and this time it is wided
150 for the first time in ODIs for Kumar Sangakkara, with another walk outside off and a boundary fine down the leg side, stood open, feet wide apart and lapped it on the full
keeps strike with a single to third man
he goes outside leg, they follow him, he pulls, into the gap at deep midwicket
follows him again with a full delivery, this time it is a single to midwicket
Thirimanne's contribution will stay 17, he's heaved a full toss to midwicket, hopefully he doesn't allow this innings to dent his confidence
moving several feet outside leg, swings the bat and the thick edge goes on the bounce to short third man
charges out and heaves, it loops over midwicket and Perera races for the second
he might as well be playing a T20, another walk outside off, another meaty connection to the lap shot
he went for the reverse sweep now, wow, but misses, bit of an underedge, says the umpire, it then brushes the pads, and AB can't collect
flat and quick outside off, slogged to midwicket, had his throw hit, Perera's dive was futile
connects from outside leg stump again, he might as well take guard there, hits over extra cover
slog-sweep, from leg stump, big, over deep square leg, into the stands
he;s gone for a big pull from outside off, but mishit one for once, and long on's settled under
full and wide, but Perera's swinging blade reaches it, and it disappears over point
boom, overpitched on middle, and Perera cracks it over the infield to the wide long off rope
went short into the left-hander, Perera swivelled and pulled very hard, but fine leg is there
high full toss pushed to long on, and Chandimal is off the mark on captaincy debut
yorker, leg stump, Perera digs it back
misses the length, it is full, and Perera has sent it soaring miles over long on with a massive golf swing

inn2.comm: ho ho, first ball, inswinging yorker, curls in flat from that low trajectory, before Ingram can even realise what is happening, it hits the base of middle, bye bye Ingram
he went for it, he did, the inswinging yorker, hits the pad, Malinga shouts for lbw, but that was headed down leg easily, and pitched outside too
he is going full for the stumps, straightens late, is nudged carefully square to the leg side
length outside off now, Duminy tries to slap it through point, underedges it
goes full again, it holds the line close to off, and is pushed away
goes for the inswinging full delivery, but it moves down leg and runs past the keeper
full and holding the line just outside off, played out to leg
coming in to off with the angle, good length, worked square
moves right forward to defend a good length ball on off
he is moving forward nicely, behind this length ball on middle now
the ball is coming on nicely, Duminy pings cover with a drive on the up
pushes past the bowler and has enough time to take the single by the time mid on gets around
he starts back of a length in this over, Duminy drops it onto the pitch
short, outside off, he gets on top of the bounce and whacks it to point
slower full delivery, 117 kph, Duminy adjusts for the lack of pace and pushes to cover
swings full into the pad, and rolls to fine leg
plays out a good length ball off the back foot to point
pitches it up, Petersen is hesitant to get forward and plays it out
punches a length ball to the bowler

that is sharp, that's skidded and hit him on the pad, he was stuck on the crease, but the appeal is turned down, Sri Lanka discuss and decide against the review, well done, replays show it pitched just outside leg
opens the face and picks up one to third man
beaten, that didn't get up, normal pace, 135 kph, slight away shape, on the bounce to the keeper
length ball left alone
this could have troubled him had he stayed back, length ball swinging back in, but Duminy's moved forward and drilled it in the air past the bowler
fuller, moves in and hits the pads down the leg side
short ball down the leg side, Petersen swivels and gets some bat on an attempted pull, enough to take it fine
thick edge as he pushes at a pitched up outswinger, away to third man
a low full toss right on the stumps, Duminy's eased it past mid off
another full inswinger, off a thick inside edge past square leg
Duminy is flowing onto the front foot and driving an overpitched ball past the non-striker

has he taken that? Sangakkara can do no wrong today, clear sound as the length ball passes the outside edge, the ball is dying on Sanga, he falls forward and manages to take it in one-handed, throws it up in celebration immediately, they check whether it carried, it did, the ball moved away a bit after pitching, and that produced the edge, but what reaction from Sanga, after batting for 45 overs, he was looking good Duminy, but this was a top delivery, had to play at it
length ball played out to the leg side
tries to slap it through the off side but underedges it towards the slips
length on the pad, and AB is away with a clip through midwicket
punched crisply to the bowler
gets across behind the line of a length ball around off and defends
goes across and plays out a length ball to the leg side
low dipping full toss on the stumps, he catches so many batsmen unawares with it, but Petersen leans out to work it to the deep square leg boundary
Malinga responds with an outswinger that beats Petetsen's prod off the back foot
opens the face to adjust for the swing and guides it to point
he shuffles outside off but this does not swing, he adjusts to work it square to leg
dropped, tough chance, AB punched this length ball hard to Eranga's left, he stretched a hand out but tumbled in the followthrough
coming in to off, pitched up, he whips it past square leg, it races away, lovely timing
they're timing those punches alright, but short extra cover's in the way of this one
drives past short extra this time, mid off gets around, but his throw misses
angled in to off, short of driving length, defended from the crease
moves forward and drives straight to cover, the ball is coming on quite well now, South Africa need some sort of partnership
good length ball on off, played out to midwicket
gets away with a wide length ball as the drive is mistimed to cover
he's taken this from outside off and turned it between mid on and midwicket, long chase for Malinga, but he pulls it back in
opens the face to a straightening delivery but finds point
that is a poor line, too wide, and AB is not missing out, bends the knee and crashes a drive past cover
AB's tried to punch this length ball from the crease, but it's moved in and has gone to mid on, Malinga has a go at the stumps, but his throw is wildly off target
short and wide, 135 kph, he misses the cut
wonderful, they are feeding him width and he;s punched this short of a length ball emphatically through point off the back foot
worked away to deep square leg
goes across and works it away, again timed superbly, but not wide enough of short fine leg, whose dive to his left is successful
smacks a drive of the front foot to extra cover
slower one, but does not help if you bowl it a couple of feet outside off, AB waits and blasts it past extra cover
length on middle, he's moved across and conjured a boundary to fine leg
wide and swinging away, mistimes it as he goes after it
this pitch is playing beautifully now for the batsmen, Petersen whips from outside off without fuss through square leg
overpitched now, into the pads, AB leans out and works it deftly between midwicket and mid on
sprays it wide, just inside the marker
overpitched on the pad again, this time AB works it softly to midwicket
tossed up slowly on off, blocked
angled in, worked out to deep square leg

Herath has delivered third ball, what a delivery, flighted, AB moved a shade outside leg, ready for the inside out drive, but he ended up pushing driving the line, and Herath hit top of off with some turn
this is pushed through flatter, and kicks on off, Faf is surprised and stabs it away
tossed up, played out off the front foot to point
comes out a tad and drives to short extra
worked through midwicket
awkwardly steers a length ball to third man, did not seem to stay low, probably he expected it to get up more
driven nicely off the front foot, no problems in the pitch
just short of driving length, worked to midwicket
out of nowhere, as he so often does, Perera gets one to kick from short of a good length, it also  moves away, Petersen follows the line from the crease and edges it to the keeper
he bowls it back of length on off, the batsman defends it to off
he bowls it slow on off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
some bounce and turn this time, Faf adjusts well in his forward defence
he comes down the track and drives the full delivery to long off
he pushes this one through on off, the batsman defends it off the front foot
he stays in the crease and punches this to cover
tossed up this time, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
he drives this length ball by moving forward and pushing away from the body, straight to cover
length delivery outside off, the batsman plants his front foot out and drives it to deep cover on the up
back of length delivery on off, doesn't get up much, Miller punches it to cover off the back foot
he is surprised with a short one this time! He thought about playing it, but ducked under it in the end as he realised this one was a bit pacier
he drives this one away from his body, gets a thick outside edge to third man
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to point from the back foot
tossed up delivery outside off, Miller comes forward and drives it to cover
he charges down the pitch  and drives the flighted delivery to long on
slightly short this one, the batsman waits on the back foot and punches it to deep extra cover
bowls a flatter one, the batsman punches it to midwicket
he comes forward and tucks the quicker delivery to deep midwicket with a wristy push
faster and flatter on the stumps, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler

no. 2 for Perera! He keeps picking up these wickets somehow. It was a fuller length delivery outside off and like he was doing in the previous over, the batsman goes forward to drive it on the up, but is not able to keep it down. Chandimal takes a good low catch at short cover
oye! Peterson gets a good sharp bouncer and he didn't know where it went after hitting the shoulder of the bat. Luckily for him, it lobs over the keeper and the slip fielder. That was quick and pacy
back of length delivery on the pads, he clips it to deep backward square leg
he comes forward and pushes the length delivery to cover
he skips down the track, but Perera bowls it on the pads and Miller is unable to get it away.
short of length delivery on the leg stump line, the batsman is unable to get it away, gets hit on high on the thigh pad
pushed back to the bowler
tossed up on the pad, worked to square leg
flighted again on the pad, nudged behind square
comes down the track and clips it past square leg
slapped out to the sweeper
leaves the crease and drives past extra cover's dive, but mid off runs around
too short and wide, but he's bashed it straight to the sweeper
punched from the crease but Chandimal dives to stop it at extra cover
angled in full, worked to midwicket
played out to midwicket
flat length ball punched wide of the sweeper
some turn on middle, he goes back and works to midwicket
driven to long on
hits a tossed up ball to the bowler
angled across from a good length, punched to mid off
leans forward to nudge past square leg
Miller gets one away, jumps out, gets under it and lofts it comfortably over deep midwicket boundary
length ball punched to the sweeper
oh dear, what a day for South Africa, Miller's gone back to cut this length ball close to off stump, but he's played on
punched to extra cover
widish length ball cut away to sweeper cover
worked through square leg
mistimes it off the back foot to midwicket
drives off the front foot to the bowler
spins into the pad and rolls fine, Mahela rushes across the ground and keeps them to one, firing the throw in, much to the delight of the crowd
flighted ball carries across, he carefully defends
paddles the sweep wide of Mahela at fine leg
goes across the left-hander again, he guides it to point
hurls it full and quick across, left alone
drives a tossed up ball past extra cover
defended off the front foot
pushes a tossed up ball, in the air for a while, to the bowler
right on off stump, he is forward to block
straightening on off stump, blocked
fires it in from round the stumps, defended
shortish delivery angled in and sitting up, Peterson goes back to crack it over midwicket
he pitches it up, Peterson drives wide of the sweeper
angled in full down the pads, nudged to deep square
low full toss hit to long on
flat and skiddy outside off, cut to sweeper cover
tosses it up full, is scythed past point for a single
punched from around off to point
Dilshan has one more, McLaren slogged this from outside off right to wide mid on, Donald has a forlorn look on his face
blocked back off the front foot
punched down the track, off the bowler's hand to mid off
played down the track
flighted and coming in to off, pushed to point
overpitched, he drives down to wide long off
drives a pitched up ball around off stump to long off
driven off the front foot to the sweeper
worked off the stumps in front of square leg
goes back to cut, this spins away sharply, and he adjusts to push to cover
drives a tossed up full ball to sweeper cover
pushes back  down the pitch, bowler dives and stops it
tries to go big but mishits it off the toe end, clears mid off though

that is a lovely delivery, he's almost bowled him through the gate after drawing him forward with a tossed up ball that's turned sharply, but it runs fine and a slide in the deep is in vain, given as runs, thin inside edge, that was a chance for Sanga then, but wait, apparently the third umpire has relayed word that it did not touch anything, in fact
hit back to the bowler off the back foot
pushes it wide down the leg side
quick and going across to off, guided to point
lunges forward to defend a tossed up ball
appeal for lbw as he goes back to the one that comes in, going down leg
lofts it in the air, and on the bounce to long on
play and miss outside off to a quicker one
plays out a flighted ball to midwicket
back of a length, blocked
worked to midwicket
gets on top of a short ball and pulls it to deep square leg
shortish and wide, cut to the sweeper
short of a length, dead batted down the pitch
there is a sound as ball passes batsman down the leg side, but it is given wide, seemed to clip the trouser on its way
Perera has his third, digs it in short with effort, Peterson is unable to get hold of the pull, and a top edge is taken by Tharanga, a fine catch running and sliding forward from deep square leg
punches one that stays low, down the track

they are in a hurry, Morkel's teed off, and hit a bunker in the form of Thirimanne at long on, good effort from the fielder, he was some way in from the rope but timed his jump to take it over his head, arms outstretched
it came in with the angle, he gets a thick inside edge as he presses forward
sharp turn outside off, left alone
comes in with the arm, he manages a thick inside edge to pad
pitched up, pushed to short extra cover
slaps a short and wide ball to the sweeper
around the blockhole, outside off, patted away
hits a good length ball to cover
gets out of the way of a bouncer just outside off, avoided quite well
widish length ball left alone
plays out a short of a length ball to the off side
drives an angled full delivery to long on
defends a tossed up ball
gets forward to block a tossed up ball
flatter, he is forward to block

and that shall do it, Phangiso jumps out and heaves at the Colombo night air, the flighted delivery spins past, Sanga collects, waits to see if Phangiso is attempting a return, and on seeing he isn't, politely removes a bail to end the fun
